# nextCaptionGroup()

**Instance Method**

Returns the next caption group.

## Declaration

```swift
func nextCaptionGroup() -> AVCaptionGroup?
```

## Return Value

The caption group, or `nil` of there are no more groups.

## Reading caption groups

- **captionsNotPresentInPreviousGroups(in:)**: Returns the set of captions in the caption group that weren’t vended by the adaptor.

items.description: Returns the set of captions in the caption group that weren’t vended by the adaptor.
items.name: captionsNotPresentInPreviousGroups(in:)
